data.title: Adolf In Blunderland: A Political Parody of Lewis Carroll's Famous Story by James Dyrenforth and Max Kester: Good Hardcover (1939) First edition
data.meta_description: First edition - Hardcover - Frederick Muller, London - 1939 - Condition: Good - No Jacket - Paper-covered boards and spine, with black and red lettering and front illustration. 188 x 254 x 10mm. 60pp. B/w illustrations throughout, many full-page plus smaller vignettes. Spine rather scuffed, with small amount of loss at head and tail; cover otherwise largely clean, though slightly discoloured; internal pages clean and unmarked. Overall a decent copy of this scarce title. NB: An extra shipping charge may be requested for heavier or more valuable items. All our 'Seller Images' show the actual item you will receive. - Adolf In Blunderland: A Political Parody of Lewis Carroll's Famous Story
data.text:
About this Item

Paper-covered boards and spine, with black and red lettering and front illustration. 188 x 254 x 10mm. 60pp. B/w illustrations throughout, many full-page plus smaller vignettes. Spine rather scuffed, with small amount of loss at head and tail; cover otherwise largely clean, though slightly discoloured; internal pages clean and unmarked. Overall a decent copy of this scarce title. NB: An extra shipping charge may be requested for heavier or more valuable items. All our 'Seller Images' show the actual item you will receive. Please contact us first before returning an item. Returns accepted within

30 days, providing goods are received in the same condition.

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 750g. We do not charge for packaging. Books are usually shipped via Royal Mail 2nd Class for domestic orders, and Royal Mail International Standard for destinations overseas.
